TopicTitle: Returning to VAB puts all of the vehicle except the command module below the ground

Articles.Content:
Return to VAB puts all of the vehicle except the command module below the ground.

You can see vehicle if you move the view to clip the ground.

Unable to select the complete vehicle to move it back up again.. only individual components can be selected

Going to launch only brings the command module

Reloading a vehicle from a recent save has the same result

Version 0.1.1.0.21572 no Mods
